name: Jain Yoga
desc: Jain yoga has been a central practice in Jainism. Jain spirituality is based on a strict code of nonviolence or ahimsa (which includes vegetarianism), almsgiving (dana), right faith in the three jewels, the practice of austerities (tapas) such as fasting, and yogic practices.

comments.author: Uros Isakovic
comments.text: There is always room for change, but you have to be open to that change.

comments.author: Nikola Barjaktarevic
comments.text: The very heart of yoga practice is 'abyhasa' â€“ steady effort in the direction you want to go.
